src:
Iket Odeng Raja Galuh Pakuan Jadi Objek Penelitian Fakultas Seni Tari UPI
07 Nov 2019, 17:02 by Ruslan Efendi


Iket Odeng Raja Galuh Pakuan Jadi Objek Penelitian Fakultas Seni Tari UPI

KBRN, Subang : Mahasiswa Seni Tari Fakultas Seni Tari Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia (UPI) Bandung Irgi Rivaldi tertarik dengan Iket Odeng yang dipakai Raka Lembaga Adat Karatwan (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, untuk dijadikan bahan penelitian tesis paskasarjana S2.
Karena menurut Irgi, diluar kebiasaan seorang raja, karena dalam benak Irgi, bahwa Raja Galuh Pakuan memakai mahkota layaknya seorang raja.
"Saya pikir mahkota yang dipakai Raja Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, sebuah mahkota yang layaknya digunakan seorang raja, makanya saya tertarik untuk melakukan penelitian untuk tesis S2 saya," ungkap Irgi kepada wartawan di Subang, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Irgi menyebutkan, iket odeng yang digunakan Raja Galuh Pakuan, memiliki keunikan tersendiri karena mengandung pilosofi yang sangat dalam, bagi seorang raja dalam memberdayakan rakyatnya.
"Ini yang saya ambil untuk bahan tesis saya, karena iket odeng yang dipakai Raja Galuh Pakuan, memiliki keunikan dan mengandung pilosofi yang sangat dalam, penuh dengan atikan, pembelajaran, dan karakter kesundaan," ujarnya.
Irgi menyebutkan, keunikan iket odeng sebagai mahkota yang digunakan Raja Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, bisa bermanfaat bagi generasi muda kedepan.
"Intinya pilosofi yang terkandung di dalam iket odeng Raja Galuh Pakuan, bisa dijewantahkan oleh generasi muda kedepan, melalui tesis yang saya buat nanti," tegas Irgi.
Selain itu dikatakannya, dengan iket odeng ini, yang menjadi bahan tesis nanti yakni, akan diperdalam lagi mengenai tarian khas yang dimiliki LAK Galuh Pakuan, dalam berbagai acara kerajaan, karena sesuai dengan tema dan mata pelajaran paskasarjana seni tari UPI, kami harus mengangkat tarian etnis Galuh Pakuan.
text:
Iket Odeng Raja Galuh Pakuan Becomes Research Object of UPI Dance Faculty
Nov 7 2019, 17:02 by Ruslan Efendi


Iket Odeng Raja Galuh Pakuan Becomes Research Object of UPI Dance Faculty

KBRN, Subang: Dance Student of the Faculty of Dance at the University of Indonesian Education (UPI) Bandung Irgi Rivaldi was interested in the Odeng Iket used by Raka Karatwan Indigenous Institution (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, to be used as a thesis research postgraduate graduate.
Because according to Irgi, it is out of the custom of a king, because in Irgi's mind, that King Galuh Pakuan wears a crown like a king.
"I think the crown worn by King Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, a crown that is used by a king, is why I am interested in doing research for my S2 thesis," Irgi told reporters in Subang, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Irgi said, the odeng etiquette used by Raja Galuh Pakuan had its own uniqueness because it contained a very deep philosophy, for a king to empower his people.
"This is what I took for my thesis material, because the odeng etiquette used by Raja Galuh Pakuan is unique and contains a very deep philosophy, full of passion, learning, and character of delay," he said.
Irgi said, the uniqueness of odeng etiquette as the crown used by Raja Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, could benefit the younger generation in the future.
"The bottom line is the philosophy contained in Raja Galuh Pakuan's odeng etiquette, it can be interpreted by the younger generation in the future, through the thesis that I will make later," Irgi stressed.
In addition, he said, with this odeng etiquette, which will become the material of the thesis, namely, it will be deepened again about the typical dances owned by LAK Galuh Pakuan, in various royal events, because according to the themes and subjects of post-graduate dance UPI dance, we must raise ethnic dances Galuh Pakuan.
